ValidationRule.description: When the field Sent to Medical Underwriting gets a date entered the user should not be able to save unless the NEP Close date is earlier than the current date that the field is checked.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordTypeId = '012700000001jeX' || RecordTypeId="0120g000000l3qD", NOT(ISNULL( Sent_to_Medical_Underwriting__c )), (NEP_Close__c > Today() || ISBLANK(NEP_Close__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: NEP Close date must be today or prior.
